meanings: make a habit[practice] of (doing), do from time to time, sometimes do, used to do, would do

meanings.meaning: make it a regular habit to...

vlive.korean: 사람들은 책상 정리나 옷장정리를 하곤 하죠. people often clean out their desks or their closets. 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : Special DJ 황치열의 밤황치열시
vlive.english: people often clean out their desks or their closets.

vlive.korean: 산책과 비슷하다는 생각을 종종 하곤 해. from time to time, I think it's similar to taking a walk. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] DAY6 Young K 편
vlive.english: from time to time, I think it's similar to taking a walk.

vlive.korean: 늘 아침마다 피곤하고 지각과의 전쟁을 하곤 합니다. We are tired every day, and we battle with being late to school. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [지각방지 라이브] 지각한 네 자리는 없어! 스트레이 키즈 편
vlive.english: We are tired every day, and we battle with being late to school.

vlive.korean: 생각을 항상 하곤 하거든요. I always think that. 듣기 View video YGK+ : 오늘의 주우재는 보이스온리
이런 얘기들을 가끔 하곤 한답니다. We say things like that. 듣기 View video T-ARA : [티아라] 국내 해외 팬들에게 새해 메세지

examples.korean: After school we’d be on the driveway shooting baskets. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 방과 후면 우리는 집 앞 진입로에서 농구를 하곤 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After school we’d be on the driveway shooting baskets. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We would often have a walk of an evening. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 자주 저녁 산책을 하곤 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We would often have a walk of an evening. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her ex-husband used to slap her around. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 전 남편은 그녀에게 손찌검을 하곤 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her ex-husband used to slap her around. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My dad used to come home drunk, shouting and cussing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아버지는 술이 취해 집에 돌아와서는 고함을 지르며 욕을 하곤 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My dad used to come home drunk, shouting and cussing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Beneficent people often donate money to poor people. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인정 많은 사람들이 종종 가난한 사람들을 위해 기부를 하곤 한다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Beneficent people often donate money to poor people. Add to Wordbook
